definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°

sentences.english: Mage Armor no longer reduces the duration of beneficial magic buffs .
sentences.chinese: 法師護甲不再降低任何有益魔法的持續時間。

sentences.english: Cripple's armor and magic penetration lowered to 10 from 25.
sentences.chinese: 殘廢的護甲與魔法穿透效果從25減少到10。

sentences.english: On the armor thing, I still feel like you are trying to turn this into "GC doesn't understand Feral itemization."
sentences.chinese: 關於護甲方面，我覺得你們還是認爲我不懂野德。

sentences.english: Check out the revamped armor and weapon properties in Chapters 1 and 2.
sentences.chinese: 瞧瞧第1章和第2章中修訂之後的護甲與武器的屬性。

sentences.english: Stoneskin Totem now increases armor instead of reducing physical damage.
sentences.chinese: 石膚圖騰現在增加護甲而非降低物理傷害。

sentences.english: The mage gains one point of armor per dot she possesses in the Time Arcanum .
sentences.chinese: 法師每具有一點時間奧祕，就獲得一點護甲。

sentences.english: Toughens the Barbarian's skin, increasing armor by X%.
sentences.chinese: 使野蠻人的皮膚變硬，增加X%護甲。

sentences.english: Trade item helmets and armors have been added.
sentences.chinese: 增加了可交易的頭盔和護甲。

sentences.english: Good. Your best armor and weapons are oiled and ready.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，您最好的護甲和武器全都已經修整完畢。

sentences.english: You can take feats to learn the proper use of other kinds of armor.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以通過學習專長來學得如何正確使用其他護甲。

sentences.english: Armor Reduction duration fixed at 5s at all ranks.
sentences.chinese: 護甲削減持續時間統一爲5秒。

sentences.english: Armor and Magic resist reduced to 25 at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 護甲和魔法抗性降低爲全等級25點。

sentences.english: The reason HoG was very strong was because of the armor.
sentences.chinese: 黃金之心非常強力的根本原因是他提供的護甲。

sentences.english: Harness of Carnal Instinct no longer has bonus armor.
sentences.chinese: 肉體本能甲冑不再享有護甲加成。

sentences.english: They grab helmets, body armor, and heavy firepower.
sentences.chinese: 他們戴上頭盔，披上護甲，拿上重火力武器。

sentences.english: FWIW, Mage Armor is quite powerful, but it's a tradeoff.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，法師護甲確實很強力，但這是一種交易。

definition: to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
formation (of a sports team, troops etc)
lit. to drive a lightweight chariot on a familiar road (idiom)/fig. to do sth routinely and with ease/a walk in the park
